overview:
Over 23 years of technology innovation. Particular expertise in building high-velocity teams that innovate and change the way we see and interact with the world and thrive in pressured environments with aggressive time lines. Specializing in product development and operations in start-up environments with a vast arsenal of development, traffic acquisition, conversion and most importantly… leadership capabilities.

Specialties:

High-Traffic / Transaction Environments, Product Design, Improved Internet Pipeline (SEO & SEM) and Conversion, Program / Project Management, Team Development, International Expansion, Venture Fund Raising
